title: Bug 45267BIDI: Mirrored text appears on every editor
description: With the driver eclipseSDK2.1.2RC1win32, every text (even in English)is mirrored. For instance, the text "Installed features" appears as"serutaef dellatsnI"I made the test on a Windows NT Hebrew enabled platformThis problem does not occur on a Windows 2000 platform.
